actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 to provide that certain federally recognized Indian tribes in the State of Oklahoma and Alaska Native Village Corporations shall be eligible applicants for purposes of assistance under title II and title VI.

summary.text: Revises the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 to provide that federally recognized Indian tribes in the State of Oklahoma and Alaska Native Village Corporations shall be eligible applicants for public service employment programs under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 to provide that certain federally recognized Indian tribes in the State of Oklahoma and Alaska Native Village Corporations shall be eligible applicants for purposes of assistance under title II and title VI.
